title: Hero’s Meditation / Shoelace
description: Begin on all fours. Cross your left knee behind your right. Sit back between your heels with an exhale. Stack your knees and point your feet behind you. Rest your hands on your knees. Close your eyes. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Lean back and carefully release your legs with an inhale. Change sides. Modification: Place a folded blanket under your hips. Avoid this pose if you have sciatica or knee injury.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
